Record.ClassificationPath: Findings_and_Disorders_Kind/Disease, Disorder or Finding/Disease or Disorder/Non-Neoplastic Disorder/Non-Neoplastic Disorder by Special Category/Infectious Disorder/Subclinical Infection
Record.Description: Infection associated with no detectable symptoms but caused by microorganisms capable of producing easily recognizable diseases, such a poliomyelitis or mumps.
